name: Quantum Bookshelves
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - move

E - read notes (the spinny things)

Left Click - take picture

Right Click - close your eyes

My entry into the Indie Tales game jam.

It's very short and kinda janky but it works (hopefully).

The downloadable version has fancier lighting.

Everything was made by me which is why it's all just cubes and 2d sprites.
